<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Specialized Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=1929) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53)

**Prerequisites**
[Incredible Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=1926)

</column>

---

You've trained your mount to perform in unusual or even extreme circumstances, granting it abilities far beyond others of its kind. Your mount gains one [specialization](/companions/animal-companions/specializations) of your choice.

**Special** You can select this feat up to three times. Each time, add a different specialization to your mount. You mount can't have more than three specializations.
name: Specialized Mount
